body.p: "Owing to missfotunes beyond my control, it has rendered it expedient that I should resign the office of Justice of the Peace I therefore file this in the Clerk's office of the County Court of Graves County as my resignation
Given under my hand this 17th August 1863

John H Robbins Deputy for J. T. Bolinger Clerk of the Graves County Court
Thomas Carman's
Resignation
Augst 17th 1863
